main event: A slow moving bright white object was observed in the sky over Dorchester, Massachusetts for approximately 5 minutes on May 30, 1964.
interesting points: The object exhibited a shallow zig-zag flight pattern., It was reported by several individuals observing planes near Logan Airport., The object's brightness varied, nearly fading out at one point., It was compared in size to the full moon and appeared very high in the sky., The weather conditions during the sighting were perfectly clear with many stars visible.
sighted object: a bright white object moving slowly in the sky
witness description: Two individuals on their back porch observing aircraft.
